FuncDef:
The remote-backup-service command creates an RBS and displays the RBS view. If a specified RBS already exists, this command directly displays the RBS view.
The undo remote-backup-service command deletes a specified RBS.
By default, no RBS is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an RBS.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters. The name can only contain digits, letters, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and periods (.). It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An RBS is used to implement dual-device backup. To create an RBS and display the RBS view, run the remote-backup-service command.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the remote-backup-profile file-name command to create an RBP.
